(((RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax - CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold - (CostsAndExpenses - CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold)) + DepreciationAndAmortization + ShareBasedCompensation + OtherNoncashIncomeExpense + OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset)) / (InterestExpenseNonoperating + OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset)

(((RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax - CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold - SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense) + DepreciationAndAmortization + OtherNoncashIncomeExpense + ShareBasedCompensation + OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset) / (InterestExpenseNonoperating + OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset))
